Jx.Store.Strategy.Paginate

Extends: Jx.Store.Strategy

Store strategy for paginating results in a store.

License

Copyright © 2009, Jon Bomgardner.

This file is licensed under an MIT style license

Summary
Jx.Store.Strategy.PaginateExtends: Jx.Store.Strategy
Options
getPaginationParamsa function that returns an object that holds the parameters necessary for getting paginated data from a protocol.
startingItemsPerPageUsed to set the intial itemsPerPage for the strategy.
startingPageThe page to start on.
expirationIntervalThe interval, in milliseconds (1000 = 1 sec), to hold a page of data before it expires.
ignoreExpirationSet to TRUE to ignore the expirationInterval setting and never expire pages.
Functions
activateactivates the strategy if it isn’t already active.
deactivatedeactivates the strategy if it is already active.
loadCalled to load data into the store
setPageAllows a caller (i.e.
getPagereturns the current page
getNumberOfPagesreturns the total number of pages.
setPageSizesets the current size of the pages.
getPageSizereturns the current page size
getTotalCountreturns the total number of items as received from the protocol.

Options

getPaginationParams

a function that returns an object that holds the parameters necessary for getting paginated data from a protocol.

startingItemsPerPage

Used to set the intial itemsPerPage for the strategy. the pageSize can be changed using the setPageSize() method.

startingPage

The page to start on.  Defaults to 1 but can be set to any other page.

expirationInterval

The interval, in milliseconds (1000 = 1 sec), to hold a page of data before it expires.  If the page is expired, the next time the page is accessed it must be retrieved again.  Default is 5 minutes (1000 * 60 * 5)

ignoreExpiration

Set to TRUE to ignore the expirationInterval setting and never expire pages.

Functions

activate

activate: function ()

activates the strategy if it isn’t already active.

deactivate

deactivate: function ()

deactivates the strategy if it is already active.

load

load: function (params)

Called to load data into the store

Parameters

paramsa Hash of parameters to use in getting data from the protocol.

setPage

setPage: function (page)

Allows a caller (i.e. a paging toolbar) to move to a specific page.

Parameters

pagethe page to move to.  Can be any absolute page number, any number prefaced with ‘-’ or ‘+’ (i.e.  ‘-1’, ‘+3’), ‘first’, ‘last’, ‘next’, or ‘previous’

getPage

getPage: function ()

returns the current page

getNumberOfPages

getNumberOfPages: function ()

returns the total number of pages.

setPageSize

setPageSize: function (size)

sets the current size of the pages.  Calling this will expire every page and force the current one to reload with the new size.

getPageSize

getPageSize: function ()

returns the current page size

getTotalCount

getTotalCount: function ()

returns the total number of items as received from the protocol.
